price: 112. Bakotunaka bango, mibu boni bolekisaki o kati ya mokili?
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
